name: FMP Boss Fight
description:
I don't  have the system for the boss attacks finished, but it's nearly ready, so for now you'll have to use the number keys to make the boss do certain attacks (1 to 6)

Controls:

Right - A

Left - D

Jump - Space

Attack - Left click

Dodge - Shift and A/D (depending on which way you want to dodge) (Incomplete)
